page.title: 13SCHOOL FETE DAY
page.content: Iwoke at 7o'clock.I read and played games until breakfast.I made a plate garden for the competition.I used moss and stones and small flowers to make a miniature garden.Gabriel made a funny animal out of vegetables for the Vegetable Figure competition.We had lunch and daddy took mummy to school so that she could set up her stall. We went to the fete at 2:30.There was a team of morris dancers,The Faithful City Morris Men.After they had danced there was the Grand Parade when the Fancy Dress was judged. Gabriel was a combine harvester and daddy was a tinker. He won a prize. The theme was a Country Fair. The challenge,when other schools send a team for a competition,was to race a lady dressed up as a scarescrow,in a wheelbarrow.We went home at 6o'clock.I went to bed at 8:40pm.
